mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, n.*from (select board_food_no as boardFoodNo, board_food_writer as boardFoodWriter, board_food_title as boardFoodTitle, board_food_content as boardFoodContent, read_count as readCount, enroll_date as enrollDate, filepath from board_food order by 1 desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
